v2.56.71:
- 通过测试后更新版本号.
- 更新Anime4KCPP,FFmpeg&FFprobe,ImageMagick.
- 适配新版Anime4KCPP.
- 修复bug:当文件在磁盘根目录时,启用[保留上级文件夹]将导致错误.

v2.56.68-beta:
- 新特性:文件列表右键菜单支持应用与取消自定义分辨率设定.
- 删除会误导用户的提示.
- 为部分按钮添加图标.
- 改进UI布局.
- 性能优化
- 为一些部件添加了无效时自动禁用.
- 改进将文件移动到输出文件夹并遇到同名文件时添加后辍的方式.

v2.56.61-beta:
- 新特性:将文件输出到指定路径时可以选择保留上级文件夹.
- 优化代码结构.
- 性能优化.
- 修复bug:未自动禁用无效选项.

-----------------------------------------
*Translated by Google Translate*

v2.56.71:
-Update the version number after passing the test.
-Update Anime4KCPP, FFmpeg&FFprobe, ImageMagick.
-Adapt to the new version of Anime4KCPP.
-Fix bug: When the file is in the root directory of the disk, enabling [Keep parent folder] will cause an error.

v2.56.68-beta:
-New feature: The right-click menu of the file list supports applying and canceling custom resolution settings.
-Remove prompts that mislead users.
-Add icons to some buttons.
-Improve UI layout.
-Performance optimization
-Automatically disable when invalid is added for some parts.
-Improved the way to add a suffix when moving files to the output folder and encountering a file with the same name.

v2.56.61-beta:
-New feature: You can choose to keep the parent folder when outputting files to the specified path.
-Optimize the code structure.
-Performance optimization.
-Fix bug: invalid options are not automatically disabled.
